<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Agile Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=3369) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 122</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_mage hand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=177)

</column>

---

When you cast _mage hand_, you can modify its target to be a set of [thieves' tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58). When you Cast the Spell in this way, the tools move up to 20 feet towards a device or lock. After you Sustain the Spell on future turns, you can use the tools to attempt [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks to [Disable a Device](/Actions.aspx?ID=69) or [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=70) within the spell's range, but you take a –2 penalty to your Thievery check. If you critically fail, the spell ends and you can't use this modification again for 24 hours.

<title level="2">Agile Hand leads to...</title>
[Larcenous Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=3384)
